definitions.definition: Any of various small two-winged flies , for example, from the family Chironomidae or non-biting midges, the family Chaoboridae or phantom midges, and the family Ceratopogonidae or biting midges, all belonging to the order Diptera .
A small , short or insignificant person .
definitions.label_groups: Scotland , Northern England , now chiefly school slang

definitions.definition: Any bait or lure designed to resemble a midge.

main_definition: Any of various small two-winged flies , for example, from the family Chironomidae or non-biting midges, the family Chaoboridae or phantom midges, and the family Ceratopogonidae or biting midges, all belonging to the order Diptera .
secondary_definitions: ( Scotland , Northern England , now chiefly school slang ) A small , short or insignificant person .
( fishing ) Any bait or lure designed to resemble a midge.
